name: GLOBAL RESEARCH EDUCATION AND TRAINING FOUNDATION

address: B-4/21 Krishna Kewal Nagar,Opp. Rupee Co-operative Bank Kondhwa Road,

briefDescription: Global Research Education and Training (GREAT) Foundation is a registered trust (E/351) set up in Pune on 6 March 2002 under the Bombay Public Trust Act 1950. GREAT Foundation is working for underprivileged children with a focus on education. It believes in giving the best education, material resources and training to less privileged school children and their teachers to help them realize their full potential and become professionals.
